extendedInfo.description: Jelli is 100% user-controlled radio, streaming 24/7 online and broadcasting on FM radio across the U.S. in cities like Las Vegas, Atlanta, Philadelphia and more. Now you can listen to the radio AND decide what plays, right from your Android phone.On Jelli, the listening community controls what plays on every station in real-time. Just tune into a station, and then start voting to decide what plays next. The Jelli tuner is full of great stations including Pop, Rock, Hip-Hop, Jazz, Country and more, as well as FM stations across the U.S. Remember, youâre the DJ! Join in with other listeners to vote for the songs you want to hear. Rocket up a favorite and if it gets voted on the air, our robot DJ T-Bone will give you all the credit. Plus every station has a live chat room so you can meet other Jelli listeners and work together to shape the playlist. Check out featured stations on Jelli like Hot97, Project 96.1 (Atlanta), WYSP, RXP, 70s, 80s and much more. Jelli is bringing democracy back to the FM airwaves. Download the Jelli app today to tune in and take control!NOTE: The Jelli for Android app currently does not support devices with hard keyboards (text input is needed for signup/login and optional live chat). More info about requested permissions in the Jelli App:http://noise.jelli.com/help/androidpermissionsTags: radio, social radio, jelli, free radio, music, rock music, dance music, electronic music, pop music, top 40, country music, hip hop music, jazz music, heavy metal music, rxp, wysp, project 96.1, power106, wpst, jelli 101.1, sxsw, 70s music, 80s music, edm

reviews.title: Best app ever!
reviews.comment: Love the music, love the fact that you can control the radio. Wish I could listen to it on my radio and not only on my phone. We need jelli in Los angeles!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: LOVE THE UI AND MUSIC
reviews.comment: The UI is very attractive. It isn\'t dull looking. The sound quality is great. It plays great music.
reviews.author: Michelangelo Smith

reviews.title: Doesn\'t work
reviews.comment: Kept trying to type in my station but it kept closing the window and forcing me back to the home screen.
reviews.author: Blah Strington

reviews.comment: Thank you!  Great job! Wish I  could dedicate songs to people from my android app.\tThank you for helping us all enjoy Jelli radio.  Excellent,work.  I\'ve had no problems whatsoever with the app. I was addicted in no time
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Good, but...
reviews.comment: I love this app, but about every couple of minutes it will stop the music and I miss parts of the song:\'( But other than that it is a great app. Plz fix..
reviews.author: Jacklyn Newton

reviews.title: Jelli lover
reviews.comment: I absolutely love jelli! Out does not freeze like other music apps... Had a variety of music.. And you choose what you want to hear. Love it!
reviews.author: Amber Mcdaniel

reviews.title: Too many trolls.
reviews.comment: I enjoy the app overall. Way too many people trolling the rooms now though. The experience isn\'t very positive anymore.
reviews.author: Eugene Krick

reviews.title: Fun and great music!
reviews.comment: Fantastic app! Great music choices, and its fun when your up to fight to have your song played. Also reminds me of being in vegas.
reviews.author: melissa lopez

reviews.title: Jelli fan
reviews.comment: I discovered this station recently on my way to work in Vegas at 4am and as soon as I timed in I set my speakers onax volume. It was great!!! Once I downloaded this app I got even more excites as they have great variety and it\'s very user friendly. I recommend this app to anyone who loves music apps....:)
reviews.author: Betty Zavala

reviews.title: Almost perfect
reviews.comment: Great app but wish u could look up people who aren\'t ur friends on Facebook and wish there was an option to play explicit versons.
reviews.author: Chris Zabinski

reviews.title: Free radio
reviews.comment: The radio is awesome. I love it because you help pick the songs to be played. Not like requesting a song on regular radio and hope they play it. Love it!!!
reviews.author: Joyse Huber

reviews.title: Awesome App
reviews.comment: Good alternative if you don\'t have satellite radio, or if your city doesn\'t have an EDM radio station!!
reviews.author: Ernesto Ramirez

reviews.title: Jukebox
reviews.comment: Same as a jukebox. Everyone chooses a song so you wait till yours plays. Getting a rocket is like moving your song closer to be played next. With my 3g network,  song pauses a lot. Also app has commercials. Pandora doesn\'t pause. Uninstalling.
reviews.author: John Arguello

reviews.title: Jelli
reviews.comment: Its a good idea giving people the chance to choose what they listen to, but this just proves that people WANT to listen to the same songs over and over again...
reviews.author: Ben Jr. Borges

reviews.title: Note 2
reviews.comment: Great to be able to listen to the station as if I were in Vegas.
reviews.author: John Doe

reviews.title: Absolutely love it!
reviews.comment: There is no app better than this one.  Not only do we get to control what plays next, but I get to hear it on the radio as well here in Las Vegas!  Kudos Jelli!
reviews.author: Joanne Marie

reviews.comment: I live in vegas & love how we have a EDM station! Jelli is great! Only 1 thing they need a bit more variety on 96.7 instead of just the top 40 EDM songs! We get a bit tired of the same songs, jelli hazz I love & listen to when I read, relax or going to sleep.the app works great!
reviews.author: Cesivel Ortiz

reviews.title: Love it love it love it!!!!!
reviews.comment: Never freezes and always gets my butt shaking.
reviews.author: Cassandra Lopez

reviews.title: Great music, so-so app
reviews.comment: Love the music and concept but the only thing keeping it from 5 stars is the app. It\'s buggy and when a bluetooth connection is broken it keeps playing the music through speakerphone. I hate that aspect. The music, stations and social media aspect is awesome.
reviews.author: Jason Linenberger

reviews.title: Addicting
reviews.comment: Such a great app. Very addicting and of course fun!
reviews.author: Meli Bau
